About Us

Precision Wire Harness Manufacturing

HARNESS+LAB is a leading manufacturer of custom wire harnesses and connector systems, specializing in JST, Molex, and TE Connectivity compatible solutions. With over 15 years of experience, we deliver engineering-grade quality from prototype to mass production.

15+
Years Experience
15K+
Connector SKUs
500+
Global Clients

Quality Rate

Our Mission

To be the most trusted partner for custom wire harness solutions by delivering exceptional quality, rapid response times, and engineering expertise that helps our customers bring their products to market faster and more reliably.

Our Engineering Team

Our diverse team of experienced engineers specializes in connector selection, custom design, and quality optimization. We work closely with customers from concept to production.

Certifications & Standards

ISO 9001:2015

Quality management system certified for consistent product quality and customer satisfaction.

UL Certified

Underwriters Laboratories certified for wire harness safety and compliance.

REACH Compliant

Full compliance with EU chemical regulations for environmental safety.

Manufacturing Capabilities

Design & Engineering

Custom harness design, CAD modeling, and DFM analysis to optimize for manufacturability and cost.

Rapid Prototyping

48-hour prototype turnaround for design validation and quick iterations.

Volume Production

Scalable manufacturing from hundreds to millions of units with consistent quality.

Quality Testing

100% continuity testing, pull testing, and electrical verification on every harness.

Global Partnership

Trusted Partner

Long-term partnerships with OEMs and CMs worldwide. Direct factory relationship ensures consistent quality and competitive pricing.

Flexible Collaboration

From design consultation to mass production, we adapt to your workflow and communication preferences.

Continuous Learning

Skill Development

Regular training programs keep our team updated with latest connector technologies and industry standards.

Knowledge Sharing

We provide technical guidance and best practices to help customers optimize their wire harness designs.

Ready to Work Together?

Let's discuss your wire harness requirements and how we can help.
